definitions.definition: a child who is regularly absent from school without permission:
examples: Police reports showed that the vast majority of crime committed by children was carried out by truants.

definitions.definition: to be regularly absent from school without permission:
examples: Most parents are horrified when they discover their children have been playing truant from school.

definitions.definition: Children who truant are regularly absent from school, usually while pretending to their parents that they have gone to school:
examples: You'll fail all your exams if you carry on truanting.
